messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] how to learn?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/30/2003 12:28:03 PM Central Daylight Time, ... I just had a conversation an hour ago with a mom about how we could homeschool without
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/30/2003 12:28:03 PM Central Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> Then
> the girl wanted to know how Moly (if her mom didn't use a curriculum)
> learned

I just had a conversation an hour ago with a mom about how we could
homeschool without using a curriculum. "Well, what grade is he in?" I said we don't do
grades. "Well, when you notify, how do you know what grade to write down?" We
don't have to give a child's grade; just their birthday. I had the feeling
that the word "unschooling" might just fry her brain.
Amy Kagey
